<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">[Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 377 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Green Man](/Deities.aspx?ID=221), [Osiris](/Deities.aspx?ID=56), [Treerazer](/Deities.aspx?ID=26), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=111)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 40-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

Dense, twitching creepers sprout from every surface and fill any bodies of water in the area. Any creature moving on the land, or [Climbing](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) or [Swimming](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) within the creepers, takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds while in the area. Once per round, you can make a vine lash out from any square within the expanse of creepers by using a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait. This vine has a 15-foot reach. Make a melee spell attack roll against the target; on a success, the vine pulls the target into the creepers and makes it [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for 1 round or until the creature [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (against your spell DC), whichever comes first.
name: Tangling Creepers
